original_title: เวลาในขวดแก้ว
overview: The life story of Nat, Pom and Jom who walk and face the ordinary life. both family problems Social problems, love problems, political problems It's an ordinary life story that could happen to anyone. Although each person has their own problems. But on the day they made their dreams come true Instead, they are faced with violent events that hurt both physically and mentally. until he grows up to be an adult full of political and family wounds.
tagline: Nat, Ning, Pom, Jom, Chai, Ek... who lives in the real society today.
title: Time in a Bottle
